title: Himi 146
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Sīsū ko hoku mālohi,
Ke ke ‘Afio mai
He ‘oku ou mo’ua lahi
‘I he ‘ahi’ahi.
2.
Ka ko hoku unga’anga,
‘A e ‘Afiona
‘I he’eku faingata’a
Mo e mafasia.
3.
Pea ‘oku ke ongo’i
‘Eku fa’a lotu,
Mo ke anga’ofa lahi
Ki he kakai ‘o ‘ou.
4.
Ke ke tuku kiate au
‘A e fa’a tatali,
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona
Pea u lava’i ai.
5.
’A hono fa’a kātaki
‘I he loto lelei,
‘A e me’a kotoa pē
Kuo tu’utu’uni.
6.
’Oku māfimafi koe
Ki he Fakatupu,
Pea mo e fakafo’ou
Ho’o ngāue ‘a ‘au. *
